title: 083 - A LOADED Pod FOD On A Feel Good Friday
description: On today's show, Tony addresses the listeners who haven't been happy with the length of episodes, and vows to be better. Plus the guys jump into a loaded Pod FOD that includes the worst place to shit your pants, people in Australia not being afraid of crocodiles, Billy Tubes being the preeminent Counterstrike handicapper in the nation, everyone's thoughts on the new spicy nuggets from McDonald's, which movie, TV show, or book characters deaths touched the guys the most, and much more before they end the show with another installment of Friday Bangerz to help send you into the best weekend ever. Keep sending your submissions to the show into @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram, and subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow for everything PMI as we close in on 1 million subscribers and our biggest giveaway ever. We appreciate you all for listening, enjoy.
